author: MarketBeat News
title: Singular Genomics Systems (OMIC) to Release Quarterly Earnings on Monday - ETF Daily News
text:
itemprop="articleBody"> Singular Genomics Systems ( NASDAQ:OMIC – Get Free Report ) is scheduled to be issuing its quarterly earnings data after the market closes on Monday, March 18th. Parties that are interested in registering for the company’s conference call can do so using this link .
Singular Genomics Systems Stock Performance Shares of OMIC opened at $0.57 on Monday. The company’s fifty day moving average is $0.50 and its 200-day moving average is $0.44. Singular Genomics Systems has a 12 month low of $0.31 and a 12 month high of $1.80. The firm has a market cap of $41.74 million, a price-to-earnings ratio of -0.44 and a beta of 1.40. The company has a quick ratio of 12.77, a current ratio of 13.64 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.05.
Get Singular Genomics Systems alerts: Analysts Set New Price Targets Separately, The Goldman Sachs Group lowered their target price on shares of Singular Genomics Systems from $0.95 to $0.85 and set a “neutral” rating on the stock in a research note on Monday, January 22nd.

Institutional Trading of Singular Genomics Systems Hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Alliancebernstein L.P. bought a new position in shares of Singular Genomics Systems during the 4th quarter worth about $26,000. Balyasny Asset Management LLC bought a new position in shares of Singular Genomics Systems during the 3rd quarter worth about $26,000. Millennium Management LLC bought a new position in shares of Singular Genomics Systems during the 4th quarter worth about $31,000. Cambridge Investment Research Advisors Inc. bought a new position in shares of Singular Genomics Systems during the 1st quarter worth about $32,000. Finally, AQR Capital Management LLC bought a new position in shares of Singular Genomics Systems during the 2nd quarter worth about $39,000. 55.75% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds.
About Singular Genomics Systems ( Get Free Report )
Singular Genomics Systems, Inc, a life science technology company, develops next generation sequencing and multiomics technology for researchers and clinicians to advance science and medicine. The company is involved in the developing of G4, consisting of G4 instrument and associated consumables for various applications, such as max read kits for single cell sequencing, rare variant detection with high-definition sequencing, gene fusion detection with ring-seq, and extended range sequencing; and PX instrument and associated consumables for applications comprising single cell gene expression and proteomics, in situ RNA sequencing, and spatial RNA and proteomics applications for tissue.
